product_name: Easton Trail AL2 Trekking Poles - Pair - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Quality and value in a trail-ready, performance package, Easton Trail AL2 Trekking Poles feature high-strength 7075 aluminum to keep you going fast and stable in the wilderness. 2-section length adjustments are easy with a powerful, nonslip twist lock. Tungsten carbide tips find traction in tough terrain. EVA foam grips on molded cores. Easton Trail AL2 Trekking Poles come with summer baskets.
short_description: Quality and value in a trail-ready, performance package, Easton Trail AL2 Trekking Poles feature high-strength 7075 aluminum to keep you going fast and stable in the wilderness.
